subject: Re: Question, How to get the U sound in "Up"?
msgSnippet: The technology makes the creation of MP3 files very simple. The recorder is available at www.talksender.com Any MP3 player will play the files.  Talksender
messageBody:
The technology makes the creation of MP3 files very simple.
The recorder is available at www.talksender.com
Any MP3 player will play the files. Talksender automates the
process of inserting the audio clip in your email.

I see no reason for pronouncing 40 sounds.
These are already pronounced on several pages including
my www.unifon.org/saunds-eng.html

Pick out ten words that are difficult for some reason and we will
work with those.

Steve

----------------------------------

Is there anyone - other than myself - that can record their voice
pronouncing the key words that define the Read letters? Perhaps
encode it as an MP3?

I'll exchange a recording for a recording. Anyone up for it?

The recorder is available at www.talksender.com
Any MP3 player will play the files.  Talksender automates the 
process of inserting the audio clip in your email.

I see no reason for pronouncing 40 sounds.
These are already pronounced on several pages including
my www.unifon.org/saunds-eng.html

Pick out ten words that are difficult for some reason and we will 
work with those.
